mapper.select: select * from users where user_id=#{id} and user_pass=#{pass}
mapper.insert: insert into users(user_id, user_pass, user_name, user_email, tel) values(#{user_id}, #{user_pass}, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{tel})
mapper.select: select * from goods where goods_name like '%' || #{name} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO basket (goods_id, user_id, price, order_cnt) values(#{goods_id}, #{user_id}, #{price}, #{order_cnt})
mapper.select: select order_id, goods_url, goods_name, b.price, category from basket b join goods using(goods_id) where user_id=#{id} order by order_id DESC
SELECT category, goods_name, SUM(b.price) as total_price, SUM(order_cnt) as total_order_cnt FROM basket b JOIN goods USING(goods_id) WHERE user_id = #{userId} GROUP BY ROLLUP(category, goods_name)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (post_date, user_id, post_title, post_content) VALUES (#{post_date}, #{user_id}, #{post_title}, #{post_content})
mapper.select: select * from post order by post_id DESC
mapper.update: update post set post_title=#{post_title}, post_content=#{post_content} where post_id=#{post_id}
